thread.title: Meet the first British family spanning six generations
thread.title_full: Meet the first British family spanning six generations

title: Meet the first British family spanning six generations
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Meet the first British family spanning six generations 21 January 2017 Last updated at 11:27 GMT 
A family from Yorkshire is thought to be the first ever in Britain to have six generations alive at the same time. 
There are 47 family members; the eldest is great-great-great grandmother Hilda Hanson, who is 103 and known as “little gran”. The youngest, baby Finley, was born on Christmas Day. 
Grandmother Sue Godward and her daughter Niki Mellor managed to baffle 5 live’s Eleanor Oldroyd with their confusing family tree. 
Sue said: “How many siblings in each generation? I’ve got a list!” 
This clip is originally from 5 live Breakfast on Saturday 21 January 2017.
